other_tests.findings: Three cases of TIPS stent infection were identified; overall infection rate of 1.7%.
Escherichia coli isolated from blood culture.
other_tests.changes_over_time: E. coli was again isolated from blood cultures despite prolonged antibiotic therapy.

other_tests.findings: Methicillin-resistant Staphylococcus aureus (MRSA) was isolated from a blood culture.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Additional blood cultures grew MRSA over the next 3 weeks.

other_tests.findings: Pseudomonas aeruginosa was isolated from a blood culture.
other_tests.changes_over_time: P. aeruginosa grew on 8 separate blood cultures during the next 11 days.
Radiological resolution of the collection was noted.

other_tests.findings: Patent TIPS stent with normal-direction blood flow.

other_tests.changes_over_time: Rapid radiological and clinical improvement after treatment.
